timeline.bodyText: It's better if we distinguish the READER_IDLE and WRITER_IDLE event
timeline.author: gabrywu

replies.bodyText: As far as heartbeat detection is concerned, this seems to be redundant. Regardless of the read and write events, they are all the same events. What do you think?
replies.author: CalvinKirs

timeline.bodyText: It's better if we distinguish the READER_IDLE and WRITER_IDLE event
